title: The Energy crunch: the nuclear dilemma
creator_credit: Patrick Uden, Lawrence Wade and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Explores the possibility of using nuclear energy for the safe production of electricity. Shows the increasing demand for power that cannot be met by the current available resources. States the potential dangers involved in switching to nuclear power
creator_credit_for_label: Patrick Uden, Lawrence Wade and British Broadcasting Corporation
